interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AISI QUEENS Short Curly Wig Black Wavy Bob Wigs for Women Synthetic Middle Part Shoudler Length Heat Resistant Wig for Daily Party Use 14 Inch
Review Date: 2021/02/04
Store: AISI QUEENS
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Wig,Curly Wig', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'AISI QUEENS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '13.5 x 9.02 x 1.77 inches; 8.47 Ounces'}
Review Text: This wig is great. It isn’t heavy and is easy to put on. It is synthetic, so if you’re looking for something more realistic, you’ll have to make some adjustments to it. I wore it for fun, and not as something for going out. Wigs are new to me, so I kind of just wear them as is for now. I like that this wig was a nice length, and natural color and style right out the pack. Overall, this is a pretty good wig. It doesn’t shed, and would be good for like Halloween, parties, or just to have fun and try something new.
Review Title: Beautiful wig. Nice and lightweight.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
HANNE None Lace Long Natural Wave Ombre Brown to Blonde Synthetic Wigs for Black Women High Density Heat Resistant Middle Part Wavy Synthetic Hair Party/Cosplay Party/Halloween Wigs (4/30/27 Wavy)
HANNE
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Wavy', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'HANNE', 'Package Dimensions': '10.19 x 8.66 x 3.26 inches; 11.53 Ounces'}
Really cute wig. It is a big long and heavy for my liking. I definitely wouldn’t be comfortable wearing this wig everyday. It is fun for trying a different look or dressing up for Halloween or a party. It is a very full wig, and doesn’t shed much. It holds the waves through several wears. The color is natural and beautiful. It does fit well, and it doesn’t come off easily.
Great wig for a natural look, but a bit heavy
Straight 13x4 Lace Front Wigs Burgundy Lace Front Wigs Long Bob Synthetic Ombre Wine Red Wig Pre-plucked with Baby Hair Free Part Heat Resistant Synthetic Lace Wigs for Women 20 Inch
NOBLE
{'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'NOBLE', 'Package Dimensions': '13.74 x 7.87 x 2.2 inches; 12.63 Ounces'}
This is one of my favorite wigs. It is more natural looking and feeling. It is not heavy or too full. This wig has a nice length and color. It is shiny, but not baby doll hair shiny. If worn correctly (with a little help from YouTube) you can achieve a very real and natural look wearing this wig. I was very impressed with this wig. It fits nicely and can be adjusted to fit your head. It is pretty secure without any extra items needed.
Good quality wig
AISI QUEENS Short Curly Wig Black Wavy Bob Wigs for Women Synthetic Middle Part Shoudler Length Heat Resistant Wig for Daily Party Use 14 Inch
AISI QUEENS
{'Hair Type': 'Wig,Curly Wig', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'AISI QUEENS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '13.5 x 9.02 x 1.77 inches; 8.47 Ounces'}
This wig is great. It isn’t heavy and is easy to put on. It is synthetic, so if you’re looking for something more realistic, you’ll have to make some adjustments to it. I wore it for fun, and not as something for going out. Wigs are new to me, so I kind of just wear them as is for now. I like that this wig was a nice length, and natural color and style right out the pack. Overall, this is a pretty good wig. It doesn’t shed, and would be good for like Halloween, parties, or just to have fun and try something new.
Beautiful wig. Nice and lightweight.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Accessories:** Prefers wigs, specifically synthetic options for versatility and style experimentation, with a recent inclination towards unique styles like short curly wigs, expanding their range beyond straight looks.
- **Style Preference:** Enjoys wavy hairstyles and natural-looking colors, showing a consistent interest in ombre effects while appreciating modern, lighter styles that maintain a natural appearance.
- **Usage Context:** Likely uses wigs for special occasions such as parties, cosplay, or Halloween, with recent purchases reinforcing this trend; the user has begun exploring more casual options for fun and experimentation.
- **Comfort Considerations:** Prefers lightweight wigs; values those that are easy to wear for longer periods, ensuring comfort and practicality, especially with new pieces showing favorable characteristics.
- **Durability and Maintenance:** Values wigs that maintain their style and structure over time, with minimal shedding confirmed in recent experiences, enhancing their satisfaction with quality.
- **Fit and Security:** Appreciates wigs that fit well and include adjustable features for a secure fit, which has been consistently met in recent purchases, contributing to satisfaction with wearability.
- **Overall Sentiment:** Enjoys the fashion aspect of wigs, balancing aesthetic appeal with comfort and usability; the user is open to trying new styles while maintaining a focus on quality and practicality.
